text: Volodymyr Pianykh (5 February 1951) is an association footballer from the former Soviet Union who played for FC Shakhtar Donetsk. After retiring as a player, Pianykh became a football referee. In 1979 Pianykh played couple of games for Ukraine at the Spartakiad of the Peoples of the USSR.Football at the 1979 Spartakiad of the Peoples of USSR Pianykh was a referee at the 1994 FIFA World Cup qualification match between Finland and Israel that took place on June 16, 1993 in Lahti, Finland.Volodymyr Pianykh at scoreshelf ==References== ==External links== * Volodymyr Pianykh at the footballfacts.ru * Volodymyr Pianykh at the allplayers.in.ua Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Donetsk Category:Soviet footballers Category:Soviet football referees Category:Ukrainian football referees Category:FC Shakhtar Donetsk players Category:FC Shakhtar Stakhanov players Category:SKA Kiev players Category:FC Shakhtar Horlivka players Category:Association football defenders
title: Volodymyr Pianykh
